channel.title: Zechariah on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Zechariah on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive

item.title: Zechariah - American Standard-ASV1901 (ASV)
item.description: Zechariah - American Standard-ASV1901 (ASV) [1:1] In the eighth month, in the second year of Darius, came the word of Jehovah unto Zechariah the son of Berechiah, the son of Iddo, the prophet, saying, [1:2] Jehovah was sore displeased with your fathers. [1:3] Therefore say thou unto them, Thus saith Jehovah of hosts: Return unto me, saith Jehovah of hosts, and I will return unto you, saith Jehovah of hosts.

item.title: Zechariah - Bible in Basic English (BBE)
item.description: Zechariah - Bible in Basic English (BBE) [1:1] In the eighth month, in the second year of Darius, the word of the Lord came to Zechariah, the son of Berechiah, the son of Iddo the prophet, saying, [1:2] The Lord has been very angry with your fathers: [1:3] And you are to say to them, These are the words of the Lord of armies: Come back to me, says the Lord of armies, and I will come back to you.

item.title: Zechariah - King James Version (KJV)
item.description: Zechariah - King James Version (KJV) [1:1] In the eighth month, in the second year of Darius, came the word of the LORD unto Zechariah, the son of Berechiah, the son of Iddo the prophet, saying, [1:2] The LORD hath been sore displeased with your fathers. [1:3] Therefore say thou unto them, Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Turn ye unto me, saith the LORD of hosts, and I will turn unto you, saith the LORD of hosts.

item.title: Zechariah - World English Bible (WEB)
item.description: Zechariah - World English Bible (WEB) [1:1] In the eighth month, in the second year of Darius, the word of Yahweh came to Zechariah the son of Berechiah, the son of Iddo, the prophet, saying, [1:2] “Yahweh was very displeased with your fathers. [1:3] Therefore tell them: Thus says Yahweh of Hosts: ‘Return to me,’ says Yahweh of Hosts, ‘and I will return to you,’ says Yahweh of Hosts. [1:4] Don’t you be like your fathers, to whom the former prophets proclaimed, saying: Thus says Yahweh of hosts, ‘Return now from your evil ways, and from your evil doings;’ but they did not hear, nor listen to me, says Yahweh.

item.title: Zechariah - Young's Literal Translation (YLT)
item.description: Zechariah - Young’s Literal Translation (YLT) [1:1] In the eighth month, in the second year of Darius, hath a word of Jehovah been unto Zechariah, son of Berechiah, son of Iddo, the prophet, saying: [1:2] `Jehovah was wroth against your fathers – wrath! [1:3] And thou hast said unto them, Thus said Jehovah of Hosts, turn back unto Me, An affirmation of Jehovah of Hosts, And I turn back unto you, said Jehovah of Hosts.
